code_block:
strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest, macos-latest]
        node: [16.x, 18.x, 20.x]
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Set up Node.js ${{ matrix.node }}
      uses: actions/setup-node@v1
      with:
        node-version: ${{ matrix.node }}
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install
    - name: Lint, Compile, Test
      run: npm test
